content: this throw is marked by a traditional feather and fan pattern it can easily be made to any size you desire - the following pattern instructions are for a 3 foot by 4 foot cozy lap blanket the necessary elements for making a lovely project are * size 10 knitting needs i used a set of 24 circular needles which worked great * a few skeins of yarn * stitch markers if preferred * darning needle for weaving in the ends note on yarn choice i used caron s cakes yarn which gradually changes color as you knit this is what produced the beautiful varying row colors in the blanket displayed
